property.display: Linker section to keep DTC vector table

constraint.display: Unique name required for each instance
Name must be a valid C symbol
Value must be a non-negative integer

property.display: Number of Blocks (Valid only in Block Mode)

constraint.display: Value must be a non-negative integer
Name must be a valid C symbol

option.display: Priority 3 (CM4: valid, CM0+: lowest - not valid if using ThreadX)
Priority 15 (CM4: lowest - not valid if using ThreadX, CM0+: invalid)
